custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MegaTTS

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen

custom_nodes.author: badxprogramm
custom_nodes.title: GradientBlurNode for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: GradientBlurNode is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows for gradient-based image blurring. This tool provides precise control over the direction, intensity, and distribution of the blur, making it ideal for creating smooth transitions, focusing attention on specific parts of an image, or adding artistic effects.

custom_nodes.title: comfyui_snacknodes

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RH_UNO
custom_nodes.description: This is a UNO ComfyUI plugin implementation that can run the full version with 24GB VRAM, as well as quickly run the FP8 version.

custom_nodes.author: lquesada
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Interactive
custom_nodes.description: Nodes that allow making the UI interactive, with selectors and switches, etc.. Enables selecting across multiple options with the click of a button to move a workflow forward.

custom_nodes.author: rickyars
custom_nodes.title: Tiled Image Generator for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that generates tiled image compositions with overlapping regions. This approach creates coherent compositions by using the edges of each tile as seeds for neighboring tiles, resulting in seamless transitions.

custom_nodes.author: zouyu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SaveImageS3
custom_nodes.description: This extension offers a custom node to save image to S3-compatible oss.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BETA-Cropnodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI designed for cropping and stitching video frames (image batches). Part of the 'Burgstall Enabling The Awesomeness' suite.

custom_nodes.author: jax-explorer
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VideoBasicLatentSync
custom_nodes.description:
Optimize OOM issues based on ComfyUI-LatentSyncWrapper. [a/ShmuelRonen/ComfyUI-LatentSyncWrapper](https://github.com/ShmuelRonen/ComfyUI-LatentSyncWrapper)
VideBasic Optimize OOM Plan: [a/jax-explorer/ComfyUI-VideoBasic](https://github.com/jax-explorer/ComfyUI-VideoBasic)

custom_nodes.author: jax-explorer
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VideoBasic
custom_nodes.description: Used to solve the OOM (Out Of Memory) issue caused by loading all frames of a video at once in ComfyUI. All nodes use streamingly, and no longer load all frames of the video into memory at once.

custom_nodes.author: nako-nakoko
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Mel_Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes with split, random, and select functions for easy visual and management of multiple cumbersome prompts

custom_nodes.author: synthetai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FaceEnhancer
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node based on GFPGAN for face enhancement, capable of restoring and enhancing faces in images and videos

custom_nodes.author: da2el-ai
custom_nodes.title: D2-SavePSD-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Saves the image in Photoshop format (PSD)

custom_nodes.author: synthetai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JM-KLing-API
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to use the KLingAI API directly within the ComfyUI environment. It is developed based on the KLingAI API documentation. For more details, please refer to the official documentation. [a/KLingAI API Documentation](https://app.klingai.com/global/dev/document-api/quickStart/productIntroduction/overview).

custom_nodes.author: CGAnimitta
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CGAnimittaTools
custom_nodes.description: A series of functional custom plugins, including Blender Bridge, Extract the value of any list type data, read text files, etc.

custom_nodes.author: Raykosan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RaykoStudio
custom_nodes.description: A node for ComfyUI that allows you to overlay text on an image in an area defined by a mask, with support for text rotation, custom fonts, line breaks and transparency.

custom_nodes.author: chou18194766xx
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-EncryptSave
custom_nodes.description: comfyui image encrypt and save.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SkyReels-A2
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for SkyReels-A2 model.

custom_nodes.author: jerrywap
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_UploadToWebhookHTTP
custom_nodes.description: Send generated images or videos to any HTTP webhook with optional parameters such as prompt-id and metadata payload.

custom_nodes.author: Temult
custom_nodes.title: Sigma Graph Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node for interactively editing sigma schedules via graph and text.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: DJ_VideoAudioMixer
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node for combining video clips with synchronized audio, background music, and advanced audio controls.

custom_nodes.author: bubbliiiing
custom_nodes.title: VideoX-Fun
custom_nodes.description: VideoX-Fun is a video generation pipeline that can be used to generate AI images and videos, as well as to train baseline and Lora models for Diffusion Transformer. We support direct prediction from pre-trained baseline models to generate videos with different resolutions, durations, and FPS. Additionally, we also support users in training their own baseline and Lora models to perform specific style transformations.

custom_nodes.author: Raykosan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RS-SaturationNode
custom_nodes.description: Professional image saturation control with artifact and highlight protection.

custom_nodes.author: MasterpieceX
custom_nodes.title: mpx-comfyui-nodes
custom_nodes.description: This Module provides nodes to allow the development of 3D Generative AI workflows that use the MasterpieceX Python SDK.

custom_nodes.author: VertexAnomaly
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ImageSentinel
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that provides an Image Loader that updates inside the workflow when the Image file is changed. This allows for a easy bridge between 3D software, and 2D art applications while retaining use of a full workflow rather than being restricted to a plugin.

custom_nodes.author: Burgstall-labs
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BS-Textchop
custom_nodes.description:
A custom node for ComfyUI that extracts text segments based on specified start and/or end marker strings. You can define multiple marker pairs to extract different segments from the same input text.
The node intelligently adapts its extraction based on whether you provide a start marker, an end marker, or both for each pair.

custom_nodes.author: Moooonet
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Align
custom_nodes.description: A powerful node alignment and color management plugin for ComfyUI, designed to enhance your workflow efficiency

custom_nodes.author: hekmon
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenAI API
custom_nodes.description: Call LLM and VLM in a simple way using the OpenAI API standard from ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-openai_fm
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates OpenAI last T2S capabilities for free

custom_nodes.author: ryanontheinside
custom_nodes.title: Control Freak for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Control Freak gives you physical control over your ComfyUI workflows by mapping MIDI controllers, gamepads, and other input devices to any node parameter or UI element. Transform your image generation experience with tactile, responsive control. Ever heard of 'flow state'?

custom_nodes.author: Jokimbe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DrawThings-gRPC
custom_nodes.description: Connect to any Draw Things gRPC server

custom_nodes.author: iSuneast
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WebhookNotifier
custom_nodes.description: The Webhook Notification plugin for ComfyUI, used to send webhook notifications when image generation is complete.

custom_nodes.author: mobilehacker
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_format-lora-stack
custom_nodes.description: Simple node to convert lora_stack output into string to generate a1111-style lora strength output text, like <lora:name:0.69>. Used to include your Lora names from Lora Stack in text input-output nodes and so on.

custom_nodes.author: ZhiHui6
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_zhihui_nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: Prompt Preset, Video Batch Loader, Video Combiner

custom_nodes.author: bvhari
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CFGStar
custom_nodes.description: A per channel implementation of the scaled CFG from this paper: [a/https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.18886](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.18886)

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LayerAnimate
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for LayerAnimate model.

custom_nodes.author: CY-CHENYUE
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GPT-API
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI to integrate GPT API.

custom_nodes.author: joeriben
custom_nodes.title: AI4ArtsEd Ollama Prompt Node
custom_nodes.description: Experimental nodes for ComfyUI. For more, see [a/https://kubi-meta.de/ai4artsed](https://kubi-meta.de/ai4artsed) A custom ComfyUI node for stylistic and cultural transformation of input text using local LLMs served via Ollama. This node allows you to combine a free-form prompt (e.g. translation, poetic recoding, genre shift) with externally supplied text in the ComfyUI graph. The result is processed via an Ollama-hosted model and returned as plain text.
